<<<<<<< HEAD
Two sermons, of Ionahs punishment ; Foure sermons preached by Maister Henry Smith ; and published by a more perfect copie then heretofore. Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
[113] p.
Printed by T.D. for Cuthbert Burby, London : 1607.
"Foure sermons" (STC 22751) includes "The trumpet of the soule","The sinfull mans search", "Maries choyse", and "Noahs drunkennesse." Signatures: A-G⁸ H¹. Title within ornamental border. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

[113] p.
Printed by T.D. for Cuthbert Burby, London : 1607.
"Foure sermons" (STC 22751) includes "The trumpet of the soule","The sinfull mans search", "Maries choyse", and "Noahs drunkennesse." Signatures: A-G⁸ H¹. Title within ornamental border. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
